activities: Payment Transaction Processing: We collect personal information to process transactions when using the Boku Service, provide services, and administer our business. The type of personal information we collect when using the Boku Service may include contact information such as mobile number, wireless network, computer or network connection identifiers, country, billing amount and Merchant or such other information we may collect with your consent or as permitted or required by law.
